__e: Shannon, I don't know what you asked Father Phil, but he ran out of here like he'd seen the devil.
- Oh, come on, Shannon, don't tell me you believe in all that starting over crap.
And for the first time in three years, Shannon isn't there with him.
And Shannon and Ben, they remind me there's more to life than all this.
Yes, but he called me. And Marshal Shannon is my sister.
